price: Na hapana yeyote katika nyinyi ambaye angeli weza kutuzuia.
arabic: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَٰجِزِينَ
footnotes: Na hapana yeyote katika nyinyi, hata ange kuwa na nguvu namna gani, angeli weza kuzuia adhabu yetu isimfikilie.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā minkum min aḥadin ʿanhu ḥājizīna
